title: Help with Flirt
content: Hoping someone can help me come up with a great script/handwriting font for the word "Flirt" or lowercase "flirt". F seems to be the hardest letter to make look good and could easily be confused as a g or b in many cases. Help would be so appreciated! Thanks
author: photomom71

comments.content:
First, look to Positype: [http://www.positype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317210957/http:/www.positype.com/ "http://www.positype.com/")  
They even have a font called Flirt! :-)

See also: [http://typographica.org/typeface-reviews/ff-pitu/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317210957/http:/typographica.org/typeface-reviews/ff-pitu/ "http://typographica.org/typeface-reviews/ff-pitu/")

hhp
Thanks so much. I love the VS font!
